If, prior to the Vesting Date, your employment with the Company and its Subsidiaries and Affiliates (the “Company Group”) terminates by reason of death or Disability, your RSU shall be fully vested, and you will receive one Share for each vested RSU, payable as soon as practicable (not more than 60 days) after such termination of employment, provided that payment may be delayed until six months after your termination of employment due to Disability to the extent the Company determines necessary to comply with Code Section 409A.
